SELECT DATE_FORMAT(stStatisticsDt, '%W') AS 'name', COUNT('statistics_id') AS 'data' FROM Statistics_tbl WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(stStatisticsDt) <= 7
GROUP BY `name` ORDER BY `name` desc;

SELECT b.slPageName AS 'name', b.slPageName AS 'name', FLOOR(COUNT(*)) AS 'data' FROM Statistics_tbl a, StatisticsLog_tbl b WHERE slPageName IS NOT NULL
AND a.statistics_id = b.statistics_id GROUP BY `name` ORDER BY data DESC limit 0,10;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS 'y', stClientScreen AS 'name' FROM Statistics_tbl WHERE stClientScreen IS NOT NULL AND TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(stStatisticsDt) <= 30
GROUP BY `name` ORDER BY `y` DESC
select distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(stBrowserInfo, '(', 1) AS 'name', count(*) as 'data', stDeviceType from Statistics_tbl where stDeviceType = 'COMPUTER' and stPromoterId = '0' group by name

select distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(stBrowserInfo, '(', -1),')', 1) as 'name', SUBSTRING_INDEX(stBrowserInfo, '(', 1) as 'no', count('name') as 'data' from Statistics_tbl where stDeviceType = 'COMPUTER' and SUBSTRING_INDEX(stBrowserInfo, '(', 1) = #{value} group by name
SELECT bnKeyword From BoardNews_tbl where boardNews_id = #{boardNews_id};
